HomePage.title: Find Your Perfect Furniture Match!
HomePage.head: Our AI-powered recommendation model analyzes your preferences and suggests complementary furniture items to create your dream space.
HomePage.browse: Browse our selection of high-quality, stylish furniture pieces that will elevate your living space.
HomePage.hear: Hear from real people who have used our AI-powered furniture recommendation system to transform their living spaces.
HomePage.ai: The AI recommendations helped me find the  perfect pieces to complement my existing  furniture. Its been a game-changer for my   living room!
HomePage.rec: As an interior designer, I rely on tools like this to help my clients visualize their dream spaces. The recommendations are spot-on every time.
HomePage.home:
I was hesitant at first, but the AI recommendations were
 surprisingly accurate. I ended up finding pieces I absolutely
 love and my living room looks better than ever.
HomePage.trust: Our AI-powered recommendation system is used by some of the biggest names in the furniture industry.
HomePage.start: Start your journey to the perfect living space with our AI-powered furniture recommendation system.

gen.tur: Can you explain airplane turbulence to someone who has never flown before? Make it conversational and concise.
gen.can: Of course! Imagine you're in a car driving down a bumpy road, and the ride isn't perfectly smooth. Sometimes, you hit small potholes or bumps, right? Well, when you're in an airplane, it's kind of like that, but in the sky.
gen.air: Airplane turbulence happens when the plane encounters pockets of air that are moving differently. It's like sailing a boat on choppy water. These air pockets can make the plane feel like it's bouncing or shaking a bit. It's completely normal and usually not dangerous at all.
gen.placeholder: Enter a prompt to generate furniture...
gen.m: Vision can make mistakes. Consider checking important information.
